title: "We Don't Have To Live Ashamed of Our Bodies" With Jess Connolly
itunes:title: "We Don't Have To Live Ashamed of Our Bodies" With Jess Connolly
description:
Have you ever struggled with a love-hate relationship with your body?
 
 As women, the world has a lot to say about our bodies. But there's a big difference between having a Kingdom perspective of ourselves rather than a worldly one. And we need to be able to recognize what the enemy says v. what God says. Author, speaker and coach Jess Connolly joins us on the podcast today and shares her personal journey to breaking free from the body shame. Friend, your value is not wrapped up in the world's definition of beauty, but in who you are in Christ. It's time to break free. Listen in!

Related Resources:

  • Make sure you grab a copy of Jess' book, Breaking Free from Body Shame and rename what the world has labeled as less-than.

  • Want to go deeper? Get the Bible study that goes along with Breaking Free from Body Shame ,and become a change agent in partnering with God to bring revival to a generation of women.

  • Big news ... Jess is speaking at She Speaks: The Best Kept Secrets for Content Creators July 14-16! Join her and women from around the world who are pursuing their God-given callings by registering today. 

Click here to download the transcript for this episode.
